attributes.action: Abolish all registration fees for NHS nurses.
attributes.additional_details: It’s a disgrace and embarrassment that this fee is still being involved within this job role. For a member of the public to be even bringing this up when this should have been resolved years ago in parliament , every member of parliament should feel ashamed.
attributes.background: Stop the fees nurses have to pay to save our lives. People are being told to stay at home while NHS nurses have to pay fees to go to work during a pandemic.
